title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 805.6 - Review by employer
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 805.6 - Review by employer

State Regulations

If the commissioner's determination modifies the abatement
period set forth in the notice of violation and order to comply, such
determination shall be deemed a final order under section
27-a
of the Labor

Law and such employer may petition for review by the Industrial Board of

Appeals pursuant to the provisions of section
101
of the Labor

Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
805.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
